Terre Haute, IN 47802

citations.narrative:
From March 12, 2025, to March 14, 2025, the registrant transported an 8-week-old American Bully puppy from Oklahoma
to Pennsylvania without keeping or maintaining a health certificate. Health certificates are important for ensuring that
animals are healthy, fit for travel and appear free of any infectious disease or physical abnormality that would be a danger
to themselves, other animals, and the public.
Correct by ensuring that any dog or puppy delivered for transportation in commerce is accompanied by a health
certificate issued by a licensed veterinarian, dated not more than 10 days prior to transportation and maintaining a copy of
all health certificates for a minimum of one year for all dogs, cats, or nonhuman primates transported.
Correct by: June 26, 2025, forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.77(b) 
   
Records: Carriers and intermediate handlers. 
From March 12, 2025, to March 14, 2025, the registrant transported an 8-week-old American Bully puppy from Oklahoma 
to Pennsylvania without keeping or maintaining a health certificate. Health certificates are important for ensuring that 
animals are healthy, fit for travel and appear free of any infectious disease or physical abnormality that would be a danger 
to themselves, other animals, and the public. 
 
 Correct by ensuring that any dog or puppy delivered for transportation in commerce is accompanied by a health 
certificate issued by a licensed veterinarian, dated not more than 10 days prior to transportation and maintaining a copy of 
all health certificates for a minimum of one year for all dogs, cats, or nonhuman primates transported. 
 
 
 
Correct by: June 26, 2025, forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
